resources.string: Arogya Sampada is an innovative telemedicine platform designed to bridge healthcare access gap in remote regions by connecting frontline health worker and patient with a virtual doctor to provide high-quality health services
The platform is powered by Ayu, a programmable digital assistant that supports frontline health workers with evidence-based protocols for primary healthcare in regional languages
The cloud-based open-source platform designed for a low-resource environment combined with a customized implementation strategy creates a digital health solution for impactful health outcomes
